org.silex.runtime.domobject.as3.TextDOMObject

type
class
extends
org.silex.runtime.domobject.base.TextDOMObjectBase
This is the Text DOMObject implementation for Flash. It displays an htmlText in a native flash text field. It needs to convert the HTML text to Flash pseudo-HTML format before displaying it

Constructor

new(referenceToNativeDOMObject : Dynamic)
class constructor. Instantiate the native text field and add it as a child of the native Sprite.
